meanings.definition: A railway system in which the track consists of a single rail.
meanings.sent1: The monorails in the city are elevated and provide a smooth ride.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy riding the monorails at amusement parks.
meanings.sent3: The monorails decided to have a race to see who is the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The monorails glided through the city like graceful dancers.
meanings.sent5: The futuristic monorails looked like silver serpents in the sky.

meanings.definition: A vehicle or train that runs on a monorail track.
meanings.sent1: The sleek monorails transported passengers swiftly across the city.
meanings.sent2: The monorails were crowded during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: The monorails had a party to celebrate their new route.
meanings.sent4: The monorails moved in perfect harmony along the track.
meanings.sent5: The monorails hummed softly as they glided along the elevated track.
